review: The fire tv does what it advertises for the most part. One of the features that I wish they would improve on though is mirroring/miracast. The chromecast trumps the fire tv stick in this functionality. I tried all night to play a movie on my fire tv stick from my phone and tablet but to no avail, and the only option is to buy an app which I see as unacceptable considering chromecast does this out of the box.

review: Love it! AWESOME! Works perfectly! Easy, SUPER EASY setup! Price is awesome! Apps are limited to YOUR choices & taste! On a personal note, I use it in my room when I get "kicked out" of the living room. I get to watch my favorite movies, tv shows & my personal favorite, WWE Network! So by all means, get it if you're not "ready" or price range is still out of your reach for the smart tv's, or your smart tv has less than stellar performance in the streaming department! Awesome, easy, user friendly tech!
